description: The original Kindle Fire HD 7 inch tablet 2012 release (1st Generation) Slim Book PU leather Case by i-Blason -- Custom designed for 2012 Kindle Fire HD 7 inch tablet. This case features a combination of functionality and style. Built for best in class material = Light Weight and DurabilityPLEASE NOTE: THIS CASE IS DESIGNED FOR THE ORIGINAL KIDNLE FIRE HD 7 INCH 1ST GENERATION VERSION OF TABLET. IT WILL NOT FIT THE ORIGINAL KINDLE FIRE, NEW KINDLE FIRE HD 7 2ND GENERATION 2013 RELEASE, KINDLE FIRE HDX 7 OR ANY OTHER KINDLE FIRE TABLETS.FEATURES:-- Super slim light weight profile/i-Blason signature premium patent leather exterior-- Flipstand for movie watching-- Magnetic closure (Easy to open and secure closure)-- Business / credit card slot-- Elastic Hand strap for secure handling-- Built-in pen holder with bonus stylus pen-- MicroSD card holder-- All i-Blason Tablet Protective Accessories Comes with i-Blason 3 Year Limited Warranty. i-Blason LLC is the Only Authorized Distributor of Original i-Blason (TM) Product. Purchases from Unauthorized Source will Not be Covered by Our Warranty.
title: i-BLASON Kindle Fire HD 7" inch Tablet Leather Case Cover / Stylus (With Smart Cover Function: Automatically Wakes and Puts the Kindle Fire HD to Sleep) (16GB WiFi) 3 Year Warranty (Black)
